projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.outcome: Increased conversion rates by 300% with sub-second page loads
projects.problem: Client needed a scalable e-commerce solution to handle 10k+ daily visitors with fast checkout
projects.approach: Built with Next.js 14, PostgreSQL for data integrity, and Redis for caching. Implemented Stripe for payments and AI-powered product recommendations.

projects.title: AI Content Generator
projects.outcome: Reduced content creation time by 90% while maintaining brand consistency
projects.problem: Marketing team spent 20+ hours weekly creating content manually with inconsistent brand voice
projects.approach: Developed AI-powered tool with custom GPT fine-tuning for brand voice, automated workflows, and content approval system.

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics
projects.outcome: Enabled data-driven decisions resulting in 25% revenue increase
projects.problem: Company lacked real-time insights into business performance across multiple channels
projects.approach: Built real-time dashboard with WebSocket connections, custom D3.js visualizations, and automated reporting using ClickHouse for fast queries.

projects.title: Custom WordPress Site
projects.outcome: Delivered high-performance WordPress site with custom blocks
projects.problem: Client needed a custom WordPress solution with advanced functionality and optimal performance
projects.approach: Built custom theme with Gutenberg blocks, optimized for Core Web Vitals, and integrated advanced custom fields.
